title: About
body:
My name is Jim Saari and I’m 19 years old and live in Kronoby, Finland. My interest are web- and game development and sports. As a person I’m calm and I enjoy learning new things.

Education

Datanom @ Optima Jakobstad (2013 - 2016)

Programming

JavaScript, PHP, Node, CSS/Sass, C#, Python

Frameworks

Vue, Aurelia, React, Laravel, Bourbon-Neat, Foundation

Program architecture

MVC, Flux, Unit Testing, OOP, FP

Tools

Webpack, Gulp, Git, Vagrant, Mocha, Jasmine

Software

Photoshop, Illustrator, Sketch, Affinity Designer, Blender, Unity, Office

Databases

SQL (MySQL, MariaDB, PostgreSQL), NoSQL (MongoDB)

OS

OSX, Windows, Linux (Ubuntu, CentOS)
